Portland.The Dream (sculpture):
Dream is a sculpture and a piece of public art by Jaume Plensa in Sutton, St Helens, Merseyside. Costing approximately £1.8m (equivalent to £2.22 million in 2016), it was funded through The Big Art Project in coordination with the Arts Council England, The Art Fund and Channel 4.


== Origin ==
In 2008 St Helens took part in Channel 4's "The Big Art Project" along with several other sites.
